poems.title: Tears of Solitude
poems.author: Sophia Roberts
poems.excerpt: In solitude, tears fall like rain, echoing the ache within...
poems.full_text: In solitude, tears fall like rain, echoing the ache within. Memories linger like shadows, haunting the corners of my heart. Yet through the pain, I find strength, a flicker of hope in the darkness.

poems.title: Broken Dreams
poems.author: Ethan Davis
poems.excerpt: In shattered dreams, echoes of what could have been...
poems.full_text: In shattered dreams, echoes of what could have been. Fragments of hope scattered like dust, lost in the winds of change. Yet amidst the ruins, a seed of resilience grows, forging a path towards healing.
